content: The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!
